description: Dressed in animal hides, three spear-totting cavemen run and hunt. They are not questing for fire, they are questing for food. Dressed in animal hides, three spear-totting cavemen (Troy Casteel, Eddie Stone and Jesse Santana) are on the hunt and whentheir prey escapes, leaving them to satisfy their hunger with each other's meat. Stone and Santana get frisky for a second on a convenient rock, sparking jealousy from Trey Casteel (Boot Black Blues), who pulls Stone away. Casteel instigates an aggressive session of sex with Stone, making Santana to watch from the afar. Casteel feeds Stone his dick, and ultimately pounding his ass mercilessly.l
title: Eon Films: The Stone Age, Scene #02
